name: polish-notation-biparser
description: Uses biparsing to parse and serialize polish notation

scripts.test-watch: find package.json src/ test/ -name '*.js' -or -name '*.json' | entr -c npm run test
scripts.lint-watch: find .eslintrc.yml src/ test/ -name '*.js' -or -name '*.yml' | entr -c npx eslint /_

author: William Rusnack
